## hpr0974 :: NELF: FreeNAS 

 
Today we listen in on a presentation given at the North East Linux Fest (https://northeastlinuxfest.org/). The speaker was Dru Lavigne - Director of the FreeBSD Foundation and her talk was about FreeNAS.

The slides can be found at https://www.slideshare.net/dlavigne/nelf2012
